#BlackMagicCraft #Episode112

What should you do with all those random miniatures that will likely never get painted or see gameplay? Turn them into statues! Great for Dungeons & Dragons puzzles. In this video I show how to turn a mini into a bronze statue, and how to make and use a wash to create a believable verdigris patina. 

BUY ITEMS USED IN THIS BUILD
